title: What is your.
body:
Favourite skin that you own?
Mine is Shockblade Zed

replies.body:
Challenger Ahri, Ravenborn Leblanc or DragonBlade Riven.  c: one of them.
Probably Ahri

I hate you. I want Challenger Ahri more than life itself. I only started getting into Ahri AFTER that skin became unavailable. If it goes up for sale at the end of this year again, I'm buying it in a heartbeat

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JAvAexjK,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-14T04:23:42.097+0000)
>
> I hate you. I want Challenger Ahri more than life itself. I only started getting into Ahri AFTER that skin became unavailable. If it goes up for sale at the end of this year again, I'm buying it in a heartbeat

Challenger Ahri will be available in a bundle along with Championship Riven, Thresh, Shyvanna and i think more unannounced skins at the end of either this worlds or the next. 
Confirmed by a Riot employee.

> [{quoted}](name=Ravenn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JAvAexjK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-14T03:08:24.274+0000)
>
>** Challenger Ahri**, Ravenborn Leblanc or DragonBlade Riven.  c: one of them.

.........................

What's that, can I eat it?

It's** DAUNTLESS AHRI** !!!!

That was the name before they changed it.
Challenger sounds better anyway since its part of a skin set as well.
wonder what the rest of the Challenger skins will be

Hmm... That's a tough one, I like Vowler in Woad Scout Quinn but I like Quinn in Corsair Quinn.

Let's be honest here, I'm an owl man. It's got to be Woad Scout Quinn.
